full_summary:
===============

**Contract Notice for SharePoint Online Configuration**
--------------------------------------------------------

**Reference:** CB-638-13120932, amendment 8
**Publication Date:** 27 September 2023
**Closing Date and Time:** 30 October 2023, 17:00 EST
**Amendment Date:** 25 October 2023

**Tender Description**
--------------------

The Canada Innovation Corporation (CIC) invites proposals from experienced service providers to design, build, and implement a SharePoint Online environment in Microsoft 365 (M365) under the Microsoft E5 licensing model. The selected team will establish an enterprise Electronic Information Management (EIM) system that meets CIC's requirements for secure file storage, collaboration, and record-keeping functionalities.

**Contract Scopes**
-----------------

* Design, build, and configure the CIC's SharePoint Online environment in Microsoft 365 (M365)
* Establish a user-friendly EIM system that allows CIC employees to securely store and collaborate on files
* Implement record-keeping functionalities to manage information throughout its lifecycle

**Evaluation Criteria**
---------------------

The proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Technical merit and pricing
* Combination of rating of technical merit and price

**Notice and Contact Information**
-------------------------------

For more information, please visit the following link: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20445/cic_im_spo_rfp_2023-v2.pdf> (English) and <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20445/cic_im_spo_rfp_2023-v2-fr.pdf> (French)

For inquiries, please contact:

Aline Frances
Phone: (343) 541-8208
Email: <Aline.Francis@fin.gc.ca>

**Contracting Entity**
---------------------

Contracting Entity: Canada Innovation Corporation
Contracting Entity Address: 90 Elgin St, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 0C6, Canada.

**Procurement Category**
----------------------

Procurement Category: SRV (Services)

**Classification under UNSPSC**
---------------------------

UNSPSC Code: 81160000 (Information Technology Service Delivery)

**Notice Type**
----------------

Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

NAFTA (North American Free Trade Agreement)

**Regions of Opportunity**
-------------------------

National Capital Region (NCR) [English], Région de la capit
